mapper.update:
update quality_sheet
delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
proposer = #{proposer,jdbcType=BIGINT},
checker_id = #{checkerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vehicle_plate_number = #{vehiclePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
production_location = #{productionLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualified = #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL},
vegetable_category_id = #{vegetableCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update quality_sheet set delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, proposer = #{proposer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checker_id = #{checkerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vehicle_plate_number = #{vehiclePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, production_location = #{productionLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualified = #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, vegetable_category_id = #{vegetableCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from quality_sheet a ,vegetable_category c where a.vegetable_category_id = c.id and a.delivery_order_id = #{delivery_order_id}

select
from quality_sheet a ,vegetable_category c where a.vegetable_category_id = c.id and c.vegetable_category_name like '%${vegetableCategoryName}%' or a.delivery_order_id like '%${vegetableCategoryName}%'
